start.text: Welcome to our medical support center! How can we assist you today?

options.text: I want to learn about your services
I need to contact a doctor
I need to raise a support ticket

insurance_query.text: Please provide details about your insurance query:

emergency.text: If this is a medical emergency, please call emergency services immediately. Would you like to see emergency contact numbers?

emergency_contacts.text:
Here are the emergency contact numbers: 
 - Ambulance: 911 
 - Poison Control: 1-800-222-1222 
 - Suicide Prevention: 988. Do you need further assistance?

mental_health.text: Mental health is important. Would you like to speak to a counselor or access mental health resources?

counselor.text: Please provide your contact details, and a counselor will reach out to you soon:

mental_resources.text: You can visit mental health organizations like NAMI (National Alliance on Mental Illness) or call helplines for support. Do you need further help?

prescription_refill.text: Do you need a prescription refill or medication change?

refill_request.text: Please provide your prescription details for a refill request:

medication_change.text: Please describe your concerns regarding your current medication:

medical_concern.text: What type of medical concern do you have?

services.text: Which service would you like to learn more about?

contact_doctor.text: How would you like to contact a doctor?

medication.text: Please provide details about your medication inquiry:

doctor_review.text:
Thank you for providing the details. A medical professional will review your information and get back to you shortly. You can contact us at 
Phone Number: 
+1 (787) 949-3280 
Email Address: 
support@totalaccessmd.net 
Would you like to ask anything else?

payment_issue.text: Please describe your payment issue so we can assist you:

raise_ticket.text: Please provide details about your issue, and we will raise a support ticket for you:

support_review.text: Thank you for reaching out. Our support team will review your request and get back to you soon. Do you need further assistance?

contact_details.text:
Thank you for reaching out to our medical support center. Our team will review your request and get back to you soon. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. 
Phone Number: 
+1 (787) 949-3280 
Email Address: 
support@totalaccessmd.net 
Office Hours: Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm EST 
Address: 123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345

general_consult.text: Our general consultation service provides access to certified doctors for common medical issues. Would you like to book an appointment?

options.text: No, tell me about other services

specialist_consult.text: We offer specialist consultations in various fields. Would you like to schedule one?

options.text: No, tell me about other services

health_packages.text: We offer various health check-up packages. Would you like to see the available options?

options.text: No, tell me about other services

appointment.text: Please provide your contact details and preferred time for the appointment:

thankyou.text:
Thank you! We have received your request and will be in touch soon. You can contact us at 
Phone Number: 
+1 (787) 949-3280 
Email Address: 
support@totalaccessmd.net 
Do you need further assistance?

end.text: Thank you for reaching out! Stay healthy and have a great day.
